content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

Note to self: actually start tracking time with Toggl (donâ€™t make future me have to set a precommitment for that too)

```plain text
7:00 | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:10   | Morning Routine
7:10 - 10:00  | Work on Dialect; help with migration to AWS
10:00 - 13:10 | Start writing my "Internet Intention" article (maybe think of a better name)
13:10 - 13:20 | Afternoon Routine
13:20 - 14:20 | Call with a friend
14:20 - 15:00 | Set up "office hours" (and maybe add a section on blog explaining it); set up a precommitment for waking up at 7am
15:00 - 16:00 | Create a concrete list of things to think about for solitude walks
16:00 - 17:00 | Actually create deadlines/quotas for side-projects (think back to 40-40-10-10 week distribution?)
17:00 - 22:00 | Finish up Reactive Emails Electron app
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:10 | Fill out Sleep Log; Brush Teeth;
7:10        | Eat Breakfast (while working on another task)
```

### Afternoon Routine

```plain text
13:10 - 13:20 | Solitude walk around the block (time to distance myself from one project and start work on the other) 
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Fill out Sleep Log; Bedtime
```

## Generic Timeblock

These entries are intentionally vague (the specifics will be listed in the specific timeblocks above), but the general order of tasks/priority of tasks is outlined in the following generic timeblock:

```plain text
7:00 - 7:10   | Morning Routine
7:10 - 13:10  | Dialect work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
13:10 - 19:10 | Precommit work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
19:10 - 20:40 | Side projects
20:40 - 22:00 | Buffer time
```
